attributes.action: MOVE THE NEW THAMES CROSSING AWAY FROM THURROCK AS WE HAVE ENOUGH TRAFFIC
attributes.additional_details:
THE BOROUGH OF THURROCK IS IN SHORT SUPPLY OF AFFORDABLE HOUSING AS IT IT, AND PUTTTING IN A NEW THAMES CROSSING WILL ONLY MAKE THAT SUPPLY EVEN LOWER.
THURROCK'S ROAD CAN NOT HANDLE THE TRAFFIC AS IT IS NOW, LET ALONE WITH A NEW THAMES CROSSING .
attributes.background:
THE PEOPLE OF THURROCK FIND IT HARD TO GET TO WORK, SCHOOLS ETC AS IT IS WITH THE QE2 BRIDGE / TUNNEL AND LAKESIDE SHOPPING CENTRE.
IF THIS NEW THAMES CROSSING GOES AHEAD THE PEOPLE OF THURROCK WILL NOT BE ABLE TO TRAVEL ANYWHERE WITHOUT LONG DELAYS.
